name: A Crumbly Planet
description:
A Crumbly Planet, a game made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 49 Compo.

Escape from a planet that is imploding! Watch out for unstable platforms...

Z to jump, arrow keys to move.

...And if you get stuck, press Q.

This is the post-compo version, if you want to rate the game, please go to the official LDJam page and select the compo version.

Changes:

  • The player movement is less sluggish;
  • The earthquake event will give some hint on the correct platforms;
  • Added an explicit “Press Z to start the game”;
  • Made the vrrr sound less annoying;
  • Made the alternative ending a little more evident :)
  • Made the levels a little less unforgiving;
  • Added some transition on level complete and on death;
  • Streamlined the death-retry loop (no more X to restart a level);
  • Bug fixes.

Made with Haxe + Haxeflixel.
